Identities.Title: title
Incapacitated: One Hero may use a Power now.
Put an Environment Card in play on the bottom of the Environment deck.

Excavation.text: Put up to 3 cards from the Environment trash on the bottom of the Environment deck. You may draw as many cards as you moved this way.

Flame Spike.text: Ra deals 1 target 1 Fire Damage. You may use an additional power this turn.

Inferno.text: Ra deals 1 target 3 Fire Damage. Ra deals up to 5 other Targets 1 Fire Damage each.

Scorched Earth.text: Ra deals each non-Hero Target X Fire Damage, where X = the number of Environment cards in play.

Summon Staff.text: Search your deck for the Staff of Ra and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. You may draw a card. You may play a card.

Drawn to the Flame.power: Ra deals each non-Hero Target X Fire Damage, where X = the number of Villain Ongoing cards in play.

Flesh of the Sun God.text: Ra is immune to Fire damage.
Flesh of the Sun God.power: Hero character cards are immune to fire damage until the start of your next turn.

Living Conflagration.on entry: When this card enters play, Ra deals 1 Target 2 Fire Damage.
Living Conflagration.power: Ra deals 1 Target 1 Fire Damage. You may draw a card.

Solar Flare.text: Increase Fire Damage dealt by Ra by 2.
Solar Flare.end of turn: At the end of your turn, Ra may deal himself 4 Psychic Damage. If he takes no Damage this way, this card is destroyed.

Wrathful Gaze.power: Destroy 1 Target with 2 or fewer HP.

Flame Barrier.text: The first time Ra is dealt Damage by a Target each turn, Ra deals that Target 2 Fire Damage.

modifiers.text: First time dealt damage by target each turn, deal back 2 fire damage

Imbued Fire.text: Increase all Fire Damage by 1. Change the Damage type of Damage dealt by Hero Targets to Fire.

modifiers.text: All fire damage +1. All heroes deal fire damage.

Staff of Ra.on entry: When this card enters play, Ra regains 3 HP.
Staff of Ra.text: Increase Damage dealt by Ra by 1.
Staff of Ra.power: Ra deals 1 Target 3 Projectile Damage. Destroy this card.
